description: This table stores plan of care (POC) contact serial number (CSN) that includes medication.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INCL_POC_CSN
columns.description: For home health patients, this item stores the Plan of Care encounter contact serial numbers (CSNs) that include this medication.
